title: Audience Response System (ARS) Strategies for Improving Health Education Learning Outcomes

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of foundational health and wellness knowledge
context.additional_context: A learning group of medical/legal/technical professionals: real-time feedback and knowledge-sharing environment using digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can accurately recall over 80% of health education content for up to three months using ARS (Audience Response System)
Learners can provide peer feedback with over 90% participation rate in ARS-based discussions
Learners can create personalized health management plans based on ARS analysis results
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
